content: The sun catcher is beautifulThe sun catcher is beautifully designed. I like that I can adjust the picture to the frame before sending it foe completion of the sun catcher. The friend we gave these to are surprised and pleased by such a unique gift.Date of experience: November 29, 2024
perfectMy custom garage sign was perfect! My husband loves it. I love how you can customize the phrases and personalize the auto and the name. Date of experience: November 29, 2024

Problem fixedAt first I had a bad experience with this company bcuz my purchases were not being delivered when promised but after giving an unpleasant review things started getting moved in the right way... The support team got in contact about that problem we got it fixed and finally received all the items and everything turned out great!Date of experience: January 07, 2025

OrnamentThe ornament that I ordered came out great! Although shipping took a little while, it was definitely worth the way.We have this for memories and years to come.great job!Date of experience: December 02, 2024

This was my first time ordering. It took a little longer than I expected cause I got it like a week before Christmas. I think I ordered it in November.This was my first time ordering from this company. I ordered a personalized blanket. The quality was good. The photo was clear and I would recommend this company and will order again. When the person opened the gift at Christmas time, they loved it and the family as well.Date of experience: November 26, 2024

I ordered 2 for me and my sister for…I ordered 2 for me and my sister for Xmas as we just lost our mum. Ordered beginning of November received early December and they were WRONG. They put people who are still alive with Angel wings on them. The writing was wrong too as it was one Angel so should be worded “I” not “we” contacted them they apologised said would be re done as priority and would receive shipping confirmation in 3-5days. Received nothing, contacted them couple of days before Xmas and no reply until the 31st December and Told apology’s they were not done so they will now be done and again 3-5days for shipping. Still received nothing emailed again Wednesday 8th January and still had no reply it’s now 12 January I first ordered these the beginning of November! Deeply upset with what I received but even more so by the appalling aftercare and customer service Edit/ replying to the sunnyzone- I have emailed many times that’s my point, I’ve had no replies to my emails. Last emailed as well wrote above ⬆️ on the 8th January and still had no reply Date of experience: January 12, 2025

This was a Christmas present for my…This was a Christmas present for my mother. In 2023 my brother died of cancer. He was only 53 and the baby of the family. The sunny zone did an outstanding job and my Mother absolutely loved it. Date of experience: November 26, 2024

No response from companyI don't know what's going on with this company but I've ordered a blanket for my friend's mom. Literally I think the end of December and I was supposed to have it Monday and they have not sent me any email of progress. If I don't get this blanket I want my money back and they'll be getting a bad review I should have had it by nowDate of experience: January 06, 2025

It was a Christmas present It was a Christmas present for my husband as he had not long had to have his dog put to sleep, and it was a beautiful  reminder of him, my husband loved itDate of experience: November 25, 2024

Was annoyed how long the delivery took…Was annoyed how long the delivery took but all in all I can’t fault the blanket, what an amazing blanket we ordered could not praise it enough , well done thank you so much Date of experience: December 31, 2024

Excellent afdter sales service and great productthe first product was scratched on the glass but a replacement was sent out immediately (just received 04/01/2025 )     Great service  and great product      thank you Date of experience: November 21, 2024

I placed my order on December 19th it’s…I placed my order on December 19th it’s going on a month and I still haven’t received my purchase. I’m trying to give you the benefit of doubt but I’m seeing too many bad reviews. Please don’t tell me your a scam like the reviews I read I’m really going to be angry can you please let me know when is the eta of my purchase. I got a tracking number on the 30th but it’s still not here yet it’s been in the same place since I received the tracking number. Please get back to me as I haven’t received an reply back through email.Date of experience: January 06, 2025

The product itself was perfect The product itself was perfect . The only issue I had was the time in which it came. In the sight it said 12/15 days but I waited over 4 weeks and I never got any updates on what was going on. Date of experience: November 27, 2024

Call it a winThis product was what I wanted as a gift for my wife (actually the dogs gave it to her, I need to trim down their allowance). After exploring your clip art for a bit, you had really accurate representations of our dogs.There were some delays in shipping, but it arrived well in advance of when it was needed. I was informed about the delay, which I appreciated.The product was exactly what I ordered. I'm not sure how you produce them, but the craftsmanship was on point. I am a fairly skilled carpenter, so I recognize good work.Do not take this as negative criticism, but more as product development. One of our dogs has a black coat, with white accents. That clip art kind of got lost in a dark background. Maybe a thin white line around the clip art? Our other dog is hopelessly white, the clip art was perfect.I am pleased.Date of experience: November 18, 2024

I ordered my goods November and I still…I ordered my goods November and I still haven't received it. The customer service says it's in transit . It was for Christmas . It's now January. I've asked for a refund but they have ignored it. The whole experience has been upsetting as it was a memorial for my husband who passed away last year and I wanted it for my tree. Date of experience: November 25, 2024
Sign was exactly as described.Sign was exactly as described.As nice as pictured on website.Date of experience: November 29, 2024

I was impressed with how lovely the…I was impressed with how lovely the ornament turned out Date of experience: November 25, 2024
Is an awesome product.The product was exactly as pictured, every one I ordered was awesome and the people I gave them to loved them.Date of experience: November 22, 2024
Lovely productLovely product, kept me informed, really loved it would recommend this company to family and friendsDate of experience: November 13, 2024

Ordered item on December 9thOrdered item on December 9th. Finally received a tracking number, but it leads me to a Chinese delivery service that gives me "unable to track item, error with order number". I've emailed Sunnyzone twice but haven't gotten a response or a notification that my email was received at all.  It's December 24th and it looks like my item will not be here by Christmas. I think the site is a scam anyway, since it leads you to believe that it's an American company when after investigation it's actually Chinese. I'm notifying my bank that it's a scam so I can get my money back. Date of experience: December 24, 2024

I will be requesting a refund since he clearly won't get this item anytime soon. Date of experience: December 20, 2024
5 girls who loved they parents dearly. The looks on the girls faces when they opened their gifts on Christmas morning and saw their parents faces on the throws.  Date of experience: December 25, 2024

SCAM TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE SCAMI ordered a memorial blanket and picture for my sister's dogs on November 2nd. 108$ charged immediately, no delivery guarantee or even a confirmation. I figured 2 months was plenty of time to receive by Christmas. NOPE. With multiple emails I received 1 response with tracking information saying out for delivery, but the tracking numbers go to 2 different shippers. The first says delivered to local carrier, the second (local carrier) says waiting on delivery. No replies to emails since. Phone number to customer service isn't real also. Called it and no answer, got a call from a guy in Alabama later saying he missed a call from me. Sunnyzone is listed in Oregon. Direct link on website to phone number once clicked is 123456789. SHADY BUSINESS Update: product now shown delivered to another state. WOWDate of experience: October 31, 2024

I had ordered 6 items prior to these last 2 items since late October, and was delighted with the accuracy of the merchandise and wrote a complimentary reply stating that. I thought this business was the most honest of others who advertise, and would have given them 5 stars.
